original_text: But Joab and Abishai continued to chase after Abner. When the sun was going down, they reached Ammah hill, near Giah. That was on the road to the wilderness of Gibeon.
korean_text: 요압과 아비새가 아브넬의 뒤를 쫓아 기브온 거친 땅의 길 가 기아 맞은쪽 암마 산에 이를 때에 해가 졌고

sentences.original_text: But Joab and Abishai continued to chase after Abner
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 요압과 아비새는 아브너를 계속 쫓아갔다

sentences.original_text: When the sun was going down
That was on the road to the wilderness of Gibeon
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 기브온 광야로 가는 길에 있었다
